name: Paladin-Cross
description:
PALADIN-CROSS



This is a Paladin, 3rd person over the shoulder view game for Comp2007 project at the University of Plymouth for Bsc(Hons) Computing & Games Development Stage 2.


This game has been created as part of a module assignment.


The Aim
The aim of the game is just to survive as long as possible, as enemy AI path around the map, patrolling. Once you are within range they will chase you down, and if they get close will start attacking you.



The Controls
The Controls of this game are:
W,A,S,D to move the player
Mouse to move the camera around
Left-Click to attack
Space to Jump
Esc to Pause
